faction.sql: SELECT DISTINCT basic_faction, basic_faction FROM logic_hero_death ORDER BY basic_faction ASC

hero.sql: SELECT DISTINCT hero, hero FROM logic_hero_attributes ORDER BY hero ASC

ability.sql: SELECT DISTINCT descid, descid FROM logic_hero_ability_unlock ORDER BY descid ASC

race.sql: SELECT DISTINCT race, race FROM pregame_skirmish_faction ORDER BY race ASC

hero_type.sql: SELECT DISTINCT hero_type, hero_type FROM abilities_lookup ORDER BY hero_type ASC

general_map.sql: SELECT name, map_id FROM Maps ORDER BY map_id ASC

value: ROUND((CAST(building_destroyed AS DECIMAL) / building_started), 4) as rate_destroyed,
ROUND((CAST(building_demolish AS DECIMAL) / building_started), 4) as rate_demolished
ROUND((CAST(building_started AS DECIMAL) / total_players), 2) as building_started_per_player,
(now() - interval '5 hours' + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY  subtable.tick_rounded)) * interval '1 minutes') as "time",
